pages.text: To go to the nether a rectangle of obsidian is no longer enough. You will have to delve deep underground and find a dimensional rift. Look for nether blocks like netherrack, obsidian, black rock etc. Just be aware that this is a one way trip. To get back to the Overworld you will have to find a Monolith. $(br2)$(o)note: you can bucket the Dimensional Plasma to make a portal closer to home.

When you find a Monolith you will have to repair it by placing gold blocks on all four sides of the Reclaimer. Then just enter the beam and fly off back to the Overworld. $(br2)$(o)note: if you enter the beam of an inactive Reclaimer you will float upwards. Wonder what fun you can have with that...
